unixem/implicit_link.h

00044 #ifndef UNIXEM_INCL_UNIXEM_H_IMPLICIT_LINK
00045 #define UNIXEM_INCL_UNIXEM_H_IMPLICIT_LINK
00046 
00047 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00048  * Version
00049  */
00050 
00051 #ifndef UNIXEM_DOCUMENTATION_SKIP_SECTION
00052 # define UNIXEM_VER_UNIXEM_H_IMPLICIT_LINK_MAJOR    1
00053 # define UNIXEM_VER_UNIXEM_H_IMPLICIT_LINK_MINOR    3
00054 # define UNIXEM_VER_UNIXEM_H_IMPLICIT_LINK_REVISION 1
00055 # define UNIXEM_VER_UNIXEM_H_IMPLICIT_LINK_EDIT     7
00056 #endif /* !UNIXEM_DOCUMENTATION_SKIP_SECTION */
00057 
00058 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00059  * Includes
00060  */
00061 
00062 #include <unixem/unixem.h>
00063 
00064 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00065  * Implicit linking
00066  */
00067 
00068 #if defined(_WIN32) || \
00069     defined(_WIN64)
00070 
00071 # if defined(__BORLANDC__) || \
00072      /* defined(__DMC__) || */ \
00073      defined(__INTEL_COMPILER) || \
00074      defined(__MWERKS__) || \
00075      defined(_MSC_VER)
00076 #  define UNIXEM_IMPLICIT_LINK_SUPPORT
00077 # endif /* compiler */
00078 
00079 #if defined(UNIXEM_IMPLICIT_LINK_SUPPORT) && \
00080     defined(UNIXEM_NO_IMPLICIT_LINK)
00081 # undef UNIXEM_IMPLICIT_LINK_SUPPORT
00082 #endif /* UNIXEM_IMPLICIT_LINK_SUPPORT && UNIXEM_NO_IMPLICIT_LINK */
00083 
00084 # if defined(UNIXEM_IMPLICIT_LINK_SUPPORT)
00085 
00086 #  if defined(__BORLANDC__)
00087 #   if __BORLANDC__ == 0x0550
00088 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME          "bc55"
00089 #   elif (__BORLANDC__ == 0x0551)
00090 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME          "bc551"
00091 #   elif (__BORLANDC__ == 0x0560)
00092 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME          "bc56"
00093 #   elif (__BORLANDC__ == 0x0564)
00094 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME          "bc564"
00095 #   elif (__BORLANDC__ == 0x0582)
00096 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME          "bc582"
00097 #   else /* ? __BORLANDC__ */
00098 #    error Unrecognised value of __BORLANDC__
00099 #   endif /* __BORLANDC__ */
00100 
00101 /*
00102 #  elif defined(__DMC__)
00103 #   define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME           "dm"
00104  */
00105 
00106 #  elif defined(__INTEL_COMPILER)
00107 #   if (__INTEL_COMPILER == 600)
00108 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME          "icl6"
00109 #   elif (__INTEL_COMPILER == 700)
00110 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME          "icl7"
00111 #   elif (__INTEL_COMPILER == 800)
00112 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME          "icl8"
00113 #   else /* ? __INTEL_COMPILER */
00114 #    error Unrecognised value of __INTEL_COMPILER
00115 #   endif /* __INTEL_COMPILER */
00116 
00117 #  elif defined(__MWERKS__)
00118 #   if ((__MWERKS__ & 0xFF00) == 0x2400)
00119 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME          "cw7"
00120 #   elif ((__MWERKS__ & 0xFF00) == 0x3000)
00121 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME          "cw8"
00122 #   elif ((__MWERKS__ & 0xFF00) == 0x3200)
00123 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME          "cw9"
00124 #   else /* ? __MWERKS__ */
00125 #    error Unrecognised value of __MWERKS__
00126 #   endif /* __MWERKS__ */
00127 
00128 #  elif defined(_MSC_VER)
00129 #   if _MSC_VER == 1000
00130 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME          "vc4"
00131 #   elif _MSC_VER == 1020
00132 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME          "vc42"
00133 #   elif _MSC_VER == 1100
00134 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME          "vc5"
00135 #   elif _MSC_VER == 1200
00136 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME          "vc6"
00137 #   elif _MSC_VER == 1300
00138 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME          "vc7"
00139 #   elif _MSC_VER == 1310
00140 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME          "vc71"
00141 #   elif _MSC_VER == 1400
00142 #    if defined(_M_X86)
00143 #     define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME         "vc8"
00144 #    elif defined(_M_X64) || \
00145           defined(_M_AMD64)
00146 #     define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME         "vc8_x64"
00147 #    elif defined(_M_IA64)
00148 #     define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME         "vc8_ia64"
00149 #    else /* ? arch */
00150 #     error Unrecognised architecture
00151 #    endif /* arch */
00152 #   elif _MSC_VER == 1500
00153 #    if defined(_M_X86)
00154 #     define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME         "vc9"
00155 #    elif defined(_M_X64) || \
00156           defined(_M_AMD64)
00157 #     define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME         "vc9_x64"
00158 #    elif defined(_M_IA64)
00159 #     define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME         "vc9_ia64"
00160 #    else /* ? arch */
00161 #     error Unrecognised architecture
00162 #    endif /* arch */
00163 #   else /* ? _MSC_VER */
00164 #    error Unrecognised value of _MSC_VER
00165 #   endif /* _MSC_VER */
00166 
00167 #  else /* ? compiler */
00168 #   error Unrecognised compiler
00169 #  endif /* compiler */
00170 
00171 
00172 # if defined(__MT__) || \
00173      defined(_REENTRANT) || \
00174      defined(_MT)
00175 #  if defined(_DLL) || \
00176       defined(__DLL)
00177 #   define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_THREADING_TYPE          ".dll"
00178 #  else /* ? dll */
00179 #   define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_THREADING_TYPE          ".mt"
00180 #  endif /* dll */
00181 # else /* ? mt */
00182 #   define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_THREADING_TYPE          ""
00183 # endif /* mt */
00184 
00185 
00186 # if defined(WIN32)
00187 #  define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_OS_TYPE                  ""
00188 # elif defined(UNIX)
00189 #  define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_OS_TYPE                  "" /* ".unix" */
00190 # else
00191 #  error Must define the operating system: either WIN32 or UNIX
00192 # endif /* OS */
00193 
00194 
00195 # if !defined(NDEBUG) && \
00196      defined(_DEBUG)
00197 #  define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_DEBUG_TYPE               ".debug"
00198 # else /* ? debug */
00199 #  define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_DEBUG_TYPE               ""
00200 # endif /* debug */
00201 
00202 #  define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_LIBRARY_BASENAME_s_(x)   #x
00203 #  define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_LIBRARY_BASENAME_s(x)    UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_LIBRARY_BASENAME_s_(x)
00204 #  define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_LIBRARY_BASENAME         "unixem." UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_LIBRARY_BASENAME_s(UNIXEM_VER_MAJOR) "."
00205 
00206 #  define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_LIBRARY_NAME             UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_LIBRARY_BASENAME UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_OS_TYPE UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_THREADING_TYPE UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_DEBUG_TYPE ".lib"
00207 
00208 #  pragma message("lib: " UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_LIBRARY_NAME)
00209 
00210 #  pragma comment(lib, UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_LIBRARY_NAME)
00211 
00212 # endif /* UNIXEM_IMPLICIT_LINK_SUPPORT */
00213 
00214 #endif /* Win32 */
00215 
00216 /* ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// */
00217 
00218 #endif /* UNIXEM_INCL_UNIXEM_H_IMPLICIT_LINK */
00219 
00220 /* ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// */
